A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I dare any of these "critics" to tell me with a straight face they were not paid or pressured to give this movie a good review.

Bad Pacing
Bad Plot
Plotholes like you cannot imagine
Comedy falls absolutely flat
No payoff of any buildup in previous film...(this is not subversive this is stupid)

At one point in this movie I saw the glimmer of hope...the ability to tie in all the Star Wars movies AND take it in a great direction...AAAAAANNNNND then it was all thrown away...

If there had never been another star wars movie this one gets a 2.5/5  taken in the larger context of what it could have been and what it ruined (kill the past amirite?) it gets a 0.5/5

Put a fork in it...any hype for Star Wars from here on out is a Disney manufactured lie.  Just like the reviews for this film are.
